means: 南非白人，布尔人（指南非的荷兰人等欧洲移民的后裔）

sentence.Network_en: They called him a traitor to his Afrikaner people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们称他背叛了自己的族人南非白人。

sentence.Network_en: Coetzee's ambivalence is to vacillate between to be or not to be Afrikaner in South Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯慈的矛盾是来自他排徊于自己是否为南非的荷裔非洲人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: They called him a traitor to his Afrikaner people.他们称他背叛了自己的族人南非白人。
afrikan 阿夫里坎, afrikaner 阿非利堪人, afrikaner 布尔人

list.abs: afrikaans 南非白人的, afrikan 阿夫里坎, afrikaans 阿非利堪斯语

entry.tran: 荷兰裔南非白人的；布尔人的
entry.def: Afrikaner means belonging or relating to the white people in South Africa whose ancestors were Dutch.

example.ex: They called him a traitor to his Afrikaner people.
example.tran: 他们称他背叛了自己的族人南非白人。

means.word_mean: 1. a white native of Cape Province who is a descendant of Dutch settlers and who speaks Afrikaans
1. belonging or relating to white people of South Africa whose ancestors were Dutch or to their language;

auth_sentence.content: They included Islamic and Christian parties, and right-wing Afrikaner and socialist groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: They included Islamic and Christian parties, and right-wing Afrikaner and socialist groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They included Islamic and Christian parties, and right-wing Afrikaner and socialist groups.

auth_sentence.content: The Afrikaner is Stoffel Visser, a civil servant and thus part of the apartheid apparatus.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Afrikaner is Stoffel Visser, a civil servant and thus part of the apartheid apparatus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Afrikaner is Stoffel Visser, a civil servant and thus part of the apartheid apparatus.

auth_sentence.content: The Afrikaner community said the song - which has since been banned - was divisive and advocated the murder of Afrikaners.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Afrikaner community said the song - which has since been banned - was divisive and advocated the murder of Afrikaners.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Afrikaner community said the song - which has since been banned - was divisive and advocated the murder of Afrikaners.
